languages.text: "Таким образом я вынужден — буквально вынужден! — искать дополнительные способы заработка, позволяющие не покидать стен сего заведения. Я наладил здесь небольшое, скажем так, предприятие — заменяю {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} усопших идентичными муляжами и перепродаю надежным людям, когда соберется партия".

traits.locale_text: "Таким образом я вынужден — буквально вынужден! — искать дополнительные способы заработка, позволяющие не покидать стен сего заведения. Я наладил здесь небольшое, скажем так, предприятие — заменяю импланты усопших идентичными муляжами и перепродаю надежным людям, когда соберется партия".
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."
languages.original_text: "Таким образом я вынужден — буквально вынужден! — искать дополнительные способы заработка, позволяющие не покидать стен сего заведения. Я наладил здесь небольшое, скажем так, предприятие — заменяю {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}импланты{/g} усопших идентичными муляжами и перепродаю надежным людям, когда соберется партия".

traits.locale_text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that would allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the implants of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the implants of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

traits.locale_text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the implants of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

traits.locale_text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the implants of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

traits.locale_text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: “所以，为了能继续留在这里，我不得不想办法寻找别的收入来源。我真的是没有别的办法了！我创立了一家小小的，嗯，这么说吧，小小的企业。我会把死者的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}换成一模一样的仿货，之后准备好送货渠道，把那些植入物卖给合适的人。”
languages.original_text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."

traits.locale_text: “所以，为了能继续留在这里，我不得不想办法寻找别的收入来源。我真的是没有别的办法了！我创立了一家小小的，嗯，这么说吧，小小的企业。我会把死者的{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}换成一模一样的仿货，之后准备好送货渠道，把那些植入物卖给合适的人。”
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: «Por eso me veo obligado, o casi, a buscar otras fuentes de ingresos para permanecer entre los muros de este establecimiento. He montado un... llamémoslo negocio aparte. Sustituyo los {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} de los difuntos por réplicas idénticas y los vendo a la gente adecuada en cuanto tengo un cargamento listo».
languages.original_text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."

traits.locale_text: «Por eso me veo obligado, o casi, a buscar otras fuentes de ingresos para permanecer entre los muros de este establecimiento. He montado un... llamémoslo negocio aparte. Sustituyo los {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantes{/g} de los difuntos por réplicas idénticas y los vendo a la gente adecuada en cuanto tengo un cargamento listo».
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: 「なので…私はこの施設内にいながら他の収入源を探すことを強制されているようなものなのです！そこで私はある事業を立ち上げました――故人の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}をまったく同じレプリカと交換し、出荷の準備ができたら必要としている人々に売っているんです」
languages.original_text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."

traits.locale_text: 「なので…私はこの施設内にいながら他の収入源を探すことを強制されているようなものなのです！そこで私はある事業を立ち上げました――故人の{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}インプラント{/g}をまったく同じレプリカと交換し、出荷の準備ができたら必要としている人々に売っているんです」
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: "Ich bin daher gezwungen – praktisch gezwungen! –, mir andere Einkommensquellen zu erschließen, bei denen ich innerhalb der Mauern dieser Einrichtung verbleiben kann. Ich habe mir ein kleines, sagen wir, Unternehmen aufgebaut – ich ersetze die {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} der Verstorbenen durch identische Nachbauten und verkaufe sie an die richtigen Leute, sobald eine Lieferung fertig ist."
languages.original_text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin daher gezwungen – praktisch gezwungen! –, mir andere Einkommensquellen zu erschließen, bei denen ich innerhalb der Mauern dieser Einrichtung verbleiben kann. Ich habe mir ein kleines, sagen wir, Unternehmen aufgebaut – ich ersetze die {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}Implantate{/g} der Verstorbenen durch identische Nachbauten und verkaufe sie an die richtigen Leute, sobald eine Lieferung fertig ist."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: « Je suis donc obligé, oui, OBLIGÉ de chercher d'autres sources de revenus afin de demeurer au sein de cet établissement. J'ai mis sur pied une petite opération lucrative : je remplace les {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} des défunts par des répliques et vends les originaux au plus offrant dès que j'ai suffisamment de stock. »
languages.original_text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis donc obligé, oui, OBLIGÉ de chercher d'autres sources de revenus afin de demeurer au sein de cet établissement. J'ai mis sur pied une petite opération lucrative : je remplace les {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} des défunts par des répliques et vends les originaux au plus offrant dès que j'ai suffisamment de stock. »
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1

languages.text: Bu yüzden de bu kurumun sınırlarından ayrılmadan para kazanabileceğim farklı gelir kapıları aramaya çok ama çok mecbur kaldım! Ufak bir girişim kurdum da denebilir. Cenazelerin {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantlarını{/g} benzer kopyalarıyla değiştiriyor ve sevkiyatları hazırlayıp doğru kişilere satıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Therefore, I am forced — practically forced! — to look for other sources of income that allow me to stay within the walls of this here establishment. I've set up a little, shall we say, enterprise — I replace the {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implants{/g} of the deceased with identical replicas and sell them to the right people when I have a shipment ready."

traits.locale_text: "Dolayısıyla bu işletmenin sınırları içinden ayrılmadan para kazanabileceğim farklı gelir kaynakları aramak zorunda kaldım! Tabiri caizse farklı bir meslek dalına atıldım. Ölülerin {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}implantlarını{/g} özdeş replikalarıyla değiştiriyorum ve sevkiyata hazır olduğumda doğru kişilere satıyorum."
traits.speaker: SideQuestSlyOfficial1
